item.title: High-performance R
item.description: R is not a fast language. But we can make it faster. This tutorial covers a number of techniques we can use to parallelize and speed up our code. A lot of the material is borrowed from Hadley Wickham’s “Advanced R” book. In particular, this workshop combines a review of basic R syntax (making sure everyone is up to speed) with more advanced R concepts. Topics covered include the following:

item.title: Basic Syntax
